SEARCH
Package library.items

Interface Item

All Known Implementing Classes:
Book, Movie
public interface Item
Interface for Items in the Library catalogue.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    Item.Genre
    Enum for Genre items.

  • Method Details

    • isAvailable

      boolean isAvailable()
      Returns if there are copies available
      Returns:
      if copies are vailable, return true; otherwise, return false;

    • checkOut

      Item checkOut() throws CheckOutException
      Checks out the Item from the Library.
      Returns:
      if available, returns a new Item with the number of copies available decreased by one
      Throws:
      CheckOutException - if the item cannot be checked out.

    • returnItem

      Item returnItem() throws ReturnException
      Returns the Item to the Library.
      Returns:
      if possible, returns a new Item with the number of copies available increased by one
      Throws:
      ReturnException - if the item cannot be returned.

    • getSubjects

      ArrayList<String> getSubjects()
      Gets subjects from Item.
      Returns:
      A copy of the subject list is returned.

    • getUID

      int getUID()
      Gets the unique id.
      Returns:
      The unique id is returned.

    • getDescription

      String getDescription()
      Gets the description.
      Returns:
      The description is returned.

    • getGenre

      Item.Genre getGenre()
      Gets the genre
      Returns:
      The genre is returned. If the genre was not set, returns null.

    • getCopies

      int getCopies()
      Gets the number of copies.
      Returns:
      The number of copies. If the number of copies was not set, returns 0.

    • getAvailableCopies

      int getAvailableCopies()
      Gets the number of copies.
      Returns:
      The number of copies available is returned.

    • getTitle

      String getTitle()
      Gets the title.
      Returns:
      The title is returned.

    • getArtistID

      int getArtistID()
      Gets the artist id
      Returns:
      The artist id is returned. If the artist was not set, return 0.
